Html:
Greetings,

I am looking for something that will work with Web Applications for printing and reporting.  Before downloading the tool and installing it, I was wondering if the Office Integration Pack has that flexibility?

Thanks for a wonderful tool...sure hope it works with WAs.

Thanks again,

Heather

Hi Heather,

The Office Integration Pack only works for Lightswitch projects that are deployed as a desktop client.

Thanks,

Steve
